items.text: drives straight to cover.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Nurse, no run

items.text: slower and fuller again, defended
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Nurse, no run

items.text: tucked away towards fine leg
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Nurse, 1 run

items.text: he's walloped this out of the ground! This is massive from DreRuss. Onto the roof and out. New balls, please. Too full and angling away, he stood his ground and swung this cleanly across deep midwicket.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Russell, SIX runs

items.text: the umpire had to duck for cover because this came back at him like a bullet! Got under this full delivery and blasted this up and over. The non-striker was also in the firing line, as was the bowler.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Russell, FOUR runs

items.text: looks to steer it fine, misses.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Russell, no run

items.text: play and a miss. Late movement away, Nurse looked to steer this behind point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Nurse, no run

items.text: heaves across the line to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Nurse, 1 run

items.text: swing and a miss. Excellent change of pace, Russell through with his heave even before the ball arrived. On the bounce to the keeper.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Russell, no run

items.text: excellent bouncer, this one is at a good height, Russell looked to pull but swayed out of the way in the end.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Russell, no run

items.text: has he holed out? Yes, he has. Long-on takes an excellent catch and the captain deserves credit for outfoxing one of the biggest hitters in the limited-overs game. Another off-cutter, landed a touch ahead of length, not too full as Russell looks to clobber this down the ground. He knew immediately that this was a miscue. Excellent from Mahmudullah too, was aware of where the ropes were and held his composure.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Russell, OUT

dismissal.text: AD Russell c Mahmudullah b Mashrafe Mortaza 13 (12b 1x4 1x6) SR: 108.33

items.text: right behind the line as he defends.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Bishoo, no run

items.preText: Shakib from around the stumps to the right hander
items.text: drifts in a full delivery, defended.
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Nurse, no run

items.text: turns this towards midwicket
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Nurse, 1 run

items.text: worked with the spin to long-on
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Bishoo, 1 run

items.text: works this with the drift to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Nurse, 1 run

items.text: rocks back and cuts to deep point, good running this time
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Bishoo, 2 runs

items.text: turns this into the leg side.
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Bishoo, no run

items.text: works this slower delivery to deep square leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Nurse, 1 run

items.text: slower length ball, worked to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Bishoo, 1 run

items.text: slower and fuller on middle and leg, turns this towards the man coming in from deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Nurse, 2 runs

items.text: the slower delivery has done the trick, the skipper is having a ball. Another off-cutter, another heave and another catch to long-on.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Nurse, OUT

dismissal.text: AR Nurse c Mahmudullah b Mashrafe Mortaza 7 (11b 0x4 0x6) SR: 63.63

items.text: squirts this length ball past cover to get off the mark
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Joseph, 1 run

items.text: belted past mid-on, races to the fence. Tap shot
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Bishoo, FOUR runs

items.text: works this indrifter to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Joseph, 1 run
